mdRecord.dcterms:title: Map of the lands, granted to the Cherokee Indians, by the state of North Carolina, under the Act of 1783: to accompany Doct. House of Reprs. No. 185, 1st session 29th Contress / lith. by E. Weber & Co. Baltimore
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 1 map ; 16 x 25 cm. on sheet 23 x 30 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Detached from: Cherokee disturbances : Message from the President of the United States, relative to the Cherokee difficulties, April 13, 1846. [original]
Map shows "Part of Tennessee" and "pt. of North Carolina." [original]
"Division line in 1809 between the upper and lower towns." [original]
